name: The Perfect Murder?
description:
Hi everyone, 

This is my Text Adventure Game for my TECH 190 and CMSC 140 classes. It took me a while to do it because I needed to figure out some things to make the game be almost perfect (at least for me).

Couple of troubles I will fix later:

  • If you touch play again, the items you collected before will still be in your inventory. But it will reset if you go to the Main Menu.
  • The music from the first scene starts again when a new scene starts

A couple of troubles but I'm on it ;)

I hope you enjoy it!

Michael Robinson Homingstar

DARK EVENTS (Lose Scene Music)

Alexandr Zhelanov, https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

WELCOME TO OLD MANOR (Gameplay Music)

HISTORIES AND TALES (Win Scene Music)

 Chichao Liao
